tr.td: Gettysburg wins toss, defers, BC receives, GC defends north
Ryan Loftus kickoff 59 yards to the BCFB6, Davonta Womack return 44 yards to the 50 yardline (Brad Walker).
Brendon Maturey pass complete to Rayvon Johnson for 14 yards to the GC36, 1ST DOWN BCFB, out-of-bounds (Mike McKnight).

Brendon Maturey rush for 3 yards to the GC25 (Glenn Benson).
